db:abstract.db:para: The Icons example shows how QIcon can generate pixmaps reflecting an icon's state, mode and size.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets requires(qtConfig(combobox))
HEADERS = iconpreviewarea.h \ iconsizespinbox.h \ imagedelegate.h \ mainwindow.h SOURCES = iconpreviewarea.cpp \ iconsizespinbox.cpp \ imagedelegate.cpp \ main.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp
DEFINES += SRCDIR=\\\"$$PWD/\\\"
EXAMPLE_FILES = images/*
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/widgets/icons INSTALLS += target
